messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is T Wheatcroft's current role in handling Leiter's body?
T Wheatcroft took charge of the body
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current status of Leiter's body?
The body is still in his possession in the Medical School facilities
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who has performed a private autopsy at the behest of Dean Fallon?
T Wheatcroft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did T Wheatcroft know Leiter while alive?
He knew Leiter as a face passed occasionally in a corridor or glimpsed at a university ceremony
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current state of Leiter's body in the Medical School facilities?
The body is in his possession in the Medical School facilities.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Has Wheatcroft already performed an autopsy on Leiter's body?
No, he has not, but he has taken charge of the body and has performed a private autopsy at the behest of Dean Fallon.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does Wheatcroft know Leiter, and is this knowledge relevant to the current situation?
Wheatcroft knew Leiter while alive only as a face passed occasionally in a corridor or glimpsed at a university ceremony—a fact he is now heartily glad of.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Wheatcroft want the investigators to promise him?
Wheatcroft wants a promise from the investigators that they will not tell anyone about the true state of Leiter’s corpse, let alone show it to anyone!
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is Wheatcroft a believer in the supernatural?
No, he denies any belief in the supernatural.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What motivates Wheatcroft to be reluctant to talk?
Guilt for his part in the cover up.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required to make Wheatcroft more helpful?
Impressing him with tact and competency, especially displaying medical or police procedural knowledge.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Wheatcroft want to transfer to the investigators?
Responsibility in the matter.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What task was Emilia Court given?
She was tasked to assist Leiter in the cataloguing and research on the Hobbhouse papers.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did Leiter treat Emilia Court after realizing her immunity to his charms?
He treated her with all the attention and care he might accord a useful adding machine.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Emilia Court doing when she called a custodian?
She was trying to get in to do her assigned work.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where was Leiter found dead?
He was found dead behind his desk in his locked office.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How was Leiter's body discovered?
She called a custodian with a passkey
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is Leiter's body being stored?
In the bowels of the Miskatonic University Medical School
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the stated cause of death on Leiter's death certificate?
Massive and sudden heart failure
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is in charge of Leiter's final disposition?
Dean Fallon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why was Professor Charles Leiter's body moved to the Medical School?
The body was moved to the Medical School's locked cold storage until Dean Fallon had it quietly and decently cremated.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the stated cause of death on the death certificate?
The death certificate stated 'massive and sudden heart failure'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How was Professor Charles Leiter's face at the moment of death?
His face was a screaming visage of horror, frozen in agony and terror at the moment of death.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect did viewing the body have on people nearby?
Viewing the body had an unnerving effect, putting anyone nearby on edge and giving them the feeling of being watched.
